summary: "Diary of a Wimpy Kid" is a popular book series by Jeff Kinney about a middle schooler named Greg Heffley who writes in a diary. Kinney worked on the first book for eight years before it was published in 2007. The series started online in 2004 and became so popular that it was turned into printed books. As of 2024, there are 18 main books and a spin-off series. The books have also been made into live-action and animated movies. The series is one of the best-selling book series of all time, with over 250 million copies sold globally.
title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid
